name: Product Gallery with Quote Button
author: Juha Sarkkinen

sections.description:
Product Gallery with Quote button makes a gallery from Products which can be added via WooCommerce. You can choose product category which products will be shown in the gallery. The plugin adds Quote button to each product. Clicking the button a user can make a contact request.

Recommended plugins

The following plugins are recommended for Product Gallery with Quote Button users:

  • WooCommerce by Automattic – With WooCommerce you can create products to be shown in Gallery
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire product-gallery-with-quote-button folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins screen (Plugins > Installed Plugins).

You will find Gallery with Quote menu in your WordPress admin screen.

For basic usage, add shortcode [gallery_with_quote]

short_description: This plugin creates a gallery from WooCommerce's products and adds Quote button to each product. By clicking the button a customer can send email …
